title: Is This the Final Smash Bros.? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.05.21
description:
Greg, Tam, and Tim come together to talk about Sora in Super Smash Bros. Ultimate, The Walking Dead coming back to Fortnite, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:00 - Housekeeping
This week you’re getting another episode of The Blessing Show. That’s Blessing and Roger’s monthly show where Bless breaks down a hot topic for you in video games.This month’s episode is loopy as hell. Make sure to check that out THIS Thursday on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames.
AND the first episode of The Arkham Files, a Kinda Funny Games Mini-Series where Barrett looks back at what makes each of the Batman: Arkham games so special, premieres next Monday, October 11th, on YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames at 2:30pm PT. Join Barrett in the live chat and talk with him about why Arkham Asylum is still a masterclass in design.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:
Pranksy & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:05:30 - Sora in Smash! Joe Skrebbels @ IGN
00:25:09 - Rick Grimes coming to Fortnite? Mark Delaney @ GameSpot
00:31:18 - Epic Games Store Getting Achievements, Austin Goslin @ Polygon
00:38:33 -  Ad
00:42:09 - Ghost Recon Frontline Is Ubisoft's New Battle Royale Shooter
00:47:37 - EA Reverses Battlefield Upgrade Plan, Hirun Cryer @ GamesRadar
00:51:10 - Konami’s Contest to Make New Games, IGN Japan
00:56:15 - No More Money on PS3 and Vita Stores, George Yang @ GameSpot
00:59:37 - Out today
01:09:25 - Squad Up:Jeremiah (PC League of Legen) - Helpfxl
01:10:45 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Blessing and Andy
